title: Why is the economy built into a pyramid system? - Quora

response.answer_text: It isn't "built" it evolves that way and is shaped like it is because fewer people/systems have the ability/determination, etc to be at the top. More are lazy and incapable, hence few at the top, and many at the bottom
because there are people in the world who want something-for-nothing (most dangerous drug anyone can take).  these people manipulate themselves into positions of power so they can get such.
